title: Flagship Carpets Circles Abstract Educational Area Rug for Kids Room Seating Décor, Children's Classroom, Play Carpet for Teaching and Playroom, Seats 20, 6' x 8'4", Primary

description: Sometimes classroom seating rugs can be busy. If your classroom could use a little less 'busy', the new Circles classroom seating carpets are one more strategy to create a little more calm in your classroom. All Flagship Carpets are CRI green Label Plus certified and made 100 percent in the USA.
